text: (nabiyē! mā haṭa avanata vū) magē vahalūnṭa oba mesē pavasanu: “ovun (ema minisun samaga katā kaḷā vuvada), kumak hon̆dada eyama pavasanu mænava! niyata vaśayenma ṣeyitān ovun atarē (naraka vacana kiyana sē salasvā) napurama karanu æta. (mandayat) niyata vaśayenma ṣeyitān minisunṭa prakaṭa satureku vaśayenma siṭinnēya. (ebævin itāmat pravēsamen siṭinu)”
